name: HomeShop18.com
overview: HomeShop18 is India’s largest virtual Home Shopping venture which operates both digitally and through television. It is a pioneer in the television home shopping space. The e-commerce portal of HomeShop18 is gradually picking up pace as it strengthens its product portfolio by adding various product categories to its catalog, further strengthening its logistics and back-end services to provide extra-ordinary shopping experience to its customers. HomeShop18 is soon going to launch India’s biggest and the most enriching book store. With around 11 warehouses in India, HomeShop18 distributes and caters to 3000 cities in India and records 1 transaction every 6 seconds! The company plans to double its revenue by the end of this fiscal year. Stay tuned to HomeShop18 as there is more for every shopper.
